content.rendered:
Starring: Adhyayan Suman, Angel, Anurag Sharma, Dev Sharma, Gulki Joshi, Divya Seth Shah, Yuri Suri, Vijay Bansal, Rahul Nair, Sunita Radia

Director: Amit Kasaria | Language: Hindi

Genre: Romance, Thriller

IMDb: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15523028/

Release/Country: 2021/USA

Bekhudi (2021) Description: A boy who is born rich, has never seen the darker side of life until he falls in love with a girl of a darker past. A thriller lover Story revolves around the protagonist Abhishek and his love life Sanya who he loves like mad. It starts with Abhishek’s feeling of uneasiness in love, when he is feeling betrayed in love while discovering the reason for the betrayal he gets to know many perspectives of her sanya’s life by meeting different people of her past relationships, every point of view is narrated by a different person has a different meaning, things start taking a grip of Abhishek and at one point he reaches a stage of confusion and lost in darkness. The story reaches its peak when Abhishek decides to kill Sanya with her ex-boyfriend and then he gets a brief of the same story from sanya’s perspective. Every character has their version of the same story which brings entertainment and excitement together, every single dialogue has its unique meaning. A new generation love story, presents the contemporary and relatable love angles which connect with today’s youth, a multi-layered narration makes the film with melodious songs makes the film “A prefect romantic thriller”. Bekhudi “Love meets reality”
